metadata.title: CVE-2017-15587 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An integer overflow was discovered in pdf_read_new_xref_section in pdf/pdf-xref.c in Artifex MuPDF 1.11.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-15587` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.12.0+ds1-1
mupdf-tools - 1.12.0+ds1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mupdf package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0+ds1-1').
